name: DEATH FROM ABOVE (itch) (ThePrinceofMars)
description:
A steampunk shoot 'em up that is heavily inspired by steel empire on the megadrive
can be played on phone or tablet by you may get slow down on older tablets also works well on a pc with a mouse.


I originally made this in 2017 and put it on the scirra arcade it never really got much attention so I am reuploading it here. Now since I made this before pixel crisis it's probably not going to be as good but I would like for more people to play it and tell me what they think.
is it worth finishing or remaking once I finish Pixel Crisis?

also, the music is from steel empire and sword of vermilion on the sega Megadrive
